node.excerpt: Wisdel will seek to make software and hardware that can facilitate self-sufficiency through a journey of incrementally seeking self-sufficiency. Here are some thoughts on the importance of self-sufficiency. THE GROWING NEED FOR SELF-SUFFICIENCY As…

Key Features: The Controller is a designed for purpose controller board, intended for use with non-critical applications that would benefit from automation. Protected connections and an industrial operational temperature range means that the device…
